Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
Deprecated Methods
com.ning.http.multipart.Part.getBoundary()
          uses a constant string. Rather use Part.getPartBoundary() 
com.ning.http.client.Realm.getDomain()
          - use getNtlmDomain() 
com.ning.http.client.Realm.RealmBuilder.getDomain()
           
com.ning.http.client.AsyncHttpClientConfig.getIdleConnectionTimeoutInMs()
          Please use AsyncHttpClientConfig.getIdleConnectionInPoolTimeoutInMs() 
com.ning.http.client.AsyncHttpClientConfig.getKeepAlive()
          - Use AsyncHttpClientConfig.getAllowPoolingConnection() 
com.ning.http.client.Request.getLength()
            
com.ning.http.client.Request.getReqType()
          - use getMethod 
com.ning.http.client.RequestBuilder.setBody(InputStream)
          RequestBuilderBase.setBody(BodyGenerator) setBody(new InputStreamBodyGenerator(inputStream)) 
com.ning.http.client.Realm.RealmBuilder.setDomain(String)
           
com.ning.http.client.AsyncHttpClientConfig.Builder.setIdleConnectionTimeoutInMs(int)
          Please use AsyncHttpClientConfig.Builder.setIdleConnectionInPoolTimeoutInMs(int) 
com.ning.http.client.AsyncHttpClientConfig.Builder.setKeepAlive(boolean)
          - Use AsyncHttpClientConfig.Builder.setAllowPoolingConnection(boolean) 
 

Deprecated Constructors
com.ning.http.client.filter.FilterContext(AsyncHandler, Request)
          use FilterContext.FilterContextBuilder instead 
com.ning.http.client.filter.FilterContext(AsyncHandler, Request, boolean)
          use FilterContext.FilterContextBuilder instead 
com.ning.http.client.filter.FilterContext(AsyncHandler, Request, HttpResponseStatus)
          use FilterContext.FilterContextBuilder instead 
com.ning.http.client.filter.FilterContext(AsyncHandler, Request, IOException)
          use FilterContext.FilterContextBuilder instead
